Document."},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["sports","football","game"],"description":"Document document.","title":"ChunkingStrategy"}],"example":"sentence","description":"Strategy used to chunk the document."},"max_sentences_per_chunk":{"type":"string","example":"80","description":"Max Document."},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-05-06T12:20-12Z","description":"Document Creation
